Title: Add GitHub status updates to Pull Request CRD.
Body:
This adds support for the GitHub Status API
(https://developer.github.com/v3/repos/statuses/).

This accompanies #778 and #895 to complete initial Pull Request support
support for GitHub OAuth.

<!-- ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ Thank you for the PR!!! ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ -->

# Changes

Adds GitHub status fetching and updates to Pull Request CRD.

# Submitter Checklist

These are the criteria that every PR should meet, please check them off as you
review them:

- [x] Includes [tests](https://github.com/tektoncd/community/blob/main/standards.md#principles) (if functionality changed/added)
- [x] Includes [docs](https://github.com/tektoncd/community/blob/main/standards.md#principles) (if user facing)
- [x] Commit messages follow [commit message best practices](https://github.com/tektoncd/community/blob/main/standards.md#commit-messages)

_See [the contribution guide](https://github.com/tektoncd/pipeline/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md)
for more details._

# Release Notes
